name: Super Nano Blaster (itch)
description:
Your mission:

Take on the Void, a terrible virus that has slowly infested your world by recycling various entities to fill its ranks.
Clear the infected layers and get to the source of the infection.
Choose between 8 ships to navigate through epic stages.
Master the Switch to avoid obstacles and rack up kills to unlock the Overclock.
Dominate the leaderboard and become the top pilot!

Not enough for you?
Set the difficulty to blackhole mode, or even try infinite mode!


Key features:
  • Single-player or local co-op
  • 8 unique ships to control
  • Destroy everything in your path
  • Switch between different planes to avoid enemies
  • 7 levels to explore in 5 difficulty modes
  • 2 game modes: Classic and Infinite
